bill_title: provide for the use and acceptance of electronic signatures on certain applications and forms by the Department of Environment and Natural Resources.
keywords: Department of Environment and Natural Resources

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the use and acceptance of electronic signatures on certain applications and forms by the Department of Environment and Natural Resources. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 1-40 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: For the purposes of this Act, the term, electronic signature, means a method of signing applications or forms submitted to the Department of Environment and Natural Resources, by electronic means. An electronic signature may be used to sign an application or form and has the same force and effect as a written signature. The Department of Environment and Natural Resources shall provide for provisions that identify and authenticate a particular person as the source of the application or form. Any identifying codes used by the department for identification and authentication are confidential. Filing an application or form signed using an electronic signature with the department is prima facie evidence that the application or form was filed by the person to whom the electronic signature has been assigned. Section 2. That chapter 1-40 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: The use or acceptance of an electronic signature shall be at the option of the Department of Environment and Natural Resources. Nothing in this Act requires an entity to use or permit the use of an electronic signature. The Department of Environment and Natural Resources shall continue to provide printed applications and forms.
